contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of June, 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED and the order of the Superior Court is REVERSED. Commonwealth v. Meadows, 567 Pa. 344, 787 A.2d 312, 320 (2001); Commonwealth v. Priovolos, 552 Pa. 364, 715 A.2d 420, 423 (1998).
